item.description: There are groups and social clubs for singles, and groups and social clubs for tall folks in the Boston area - but this is the only social group that specifically caters for TALL, SINGLE and SOCIALLY ACTIVE adults in the greater Boston area!! So: If you are TALL (Female at least 5ft 8in in height, Male at least 6'0"ft in height), 21+ years in age, SINGLE (You have never been Married, or you are Divorced, or you are Widowed) and looking to meet, interact, socialize and experience the wonders of BOSTON and its surrounding areas, with other BOSTON TALL SINGLES, Then this is a group you need to join! We are looking for enthusiastic folks who will actively participate in events, contribute ideas and suggestions, and - most importantly - promote fun and friendship in everything that we do (regardless of the weather or how well/badly the Red Sox/Patriots are doing!). PLEASE NOTE OUR GROUP POLICIES AND GROUND RULES AT: http://www.meetup.com/bostontallsingles/about/ including our requirements for ALL members to: (1) Complete ALL sections of the profile; (2) Post a clear head & shoulders photo from which they can be recognized; (3) Provide at least a first name as part of their user title or in the text of their profile.
item.name: Boston Tall Singles
